author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Second step for V15 geometry of HGCal. Adding algorithms to define a full silicon module

#### PR validation:

Tested using runTheMatrix test workflow 32634.0 and using test cfg's within Geometry/HGCalCommonData/test/python

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Nothing special
title: Run4-hgx283x Second step for V15 geometry of HGCal
